title: YMCA CodeShare Sandbox
description: Welcome to the YMCA CodeShare demo site! Compare the three themes currently offered on YMCA CodeShare and discover the range of capabilities across different installation levels of the platform.
intro: Welcome to the YMCA CodeShare demo site! Compare the three themes currently offered on YMCA CodeShare and discover the range of capabilities across different installation levels of the platform.

cards.title: Rose: Standard install
cards.description: Standard-level YMCA CodeShare offers everything a YMCA Association needs for a comprehensive website. Rose offers sprawling site menu options and high accessibility for blind or low vision users.

cards.title: Lily: Standard install
cards.description: Standard-level YMCA CodeShare offers everything a YMCA Association needs for a comprehensive website. Lily offers bold banner headings and eye-catching tiles to organize child page content.

cards.title: Carnation: Standard install
cards.description: Standard-level YMCA CodeShare offers everything a YMCA Association needs for a comprehensive website. Carnation offers image-rich page layouts and simple, mobile-optimized menus.

cards.title: Rose: Extended install
cards.description: Extended-level YMCA CodeShare is an option for large YMCA Associations who desire deep integrations with third party software and advanced feature. Rose offers sprawling site menu options and high accessibility levels for blind or low vision users.

cards.title: Lily: Extended install
cards.description: Extended-level YMCA CodeShare is an option for large YMCA Associations who desire deep integrations with third party software and advanced feature. Lily offers bold banner headings and eye-catching tiles to organize child page content.

cards.title: Carnation: Extended install
cards.description: Extended-level YMCA CodeShare is an option for large YMCA Associations who desire deep integrations with third party software and advanced features. Carnation offers image-rich page layouts and simple, mobile-optimized menus.

cards.title: Rose: Custom install
cards.description: Custom-level YMCA CodeShare is for developers to review all possible features, including experimental ones, available in YMCA CodeShare. Rose offers sprawling site menu options and high accessibility levels for blind or low vision users.

cards.title: Lily: Custom install
cards.description: Custom-level YMCA CodeShare is for developers to review all possible features, including experimental ones, available in YMCA CodeShare. Lily offers bold banner headings and eye-catching tiles to organize child page content.

cards.title: Carnation: Custom install
cards.description: Custom-level YMCA CodeShare is for developers to review all possible features, including experimental ones, available in YMCA CodeShare.. Carnation offers image-rich page layouts and simple, mobile-optimized menus.
